name: Abaddon
title: Lord of Avernus
lore: The Font of Avernus is the source of a family's strength, a well of dark power that infuses the blood of every noble in the House of Avernus.

mistCoil.name: Mist Coil
mistCoil.description: Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that damages an enemy or heals an ally at the cost of his own health.

aphotic_shield.name: Aphotic Shield
aphotic_shield.description: Summons dark energies around an ally, creating a shield that absorbs damage. When the shield breaks, it explodes and damages nearby enemies.

curse_of_avernus.name: Curse of Avernus
curse_of_avernus.description: Abaddon strikes enemies with his cursed blade, slowing them and causing those nearby to receive increased damage.

borrowedTime.name: Borrowed Time
borrowedTime.description: When activated, all damage dealt to Abaddon heals instead of hurting him. Automatically triggers when his health drops too low.
